overview: Sequence of one of the best school jobs zoos of all time, Inglourious Whiskers 2 back back Don Quixota and Sam Chupão on a journey to kill the big bad villain so fucking that in the previous movie he destroyed the whole fucking and left nothing for the personal play . The plot has the participation of famous icons unknown by society (soon not being famous ... but dreaming is good) like Seroa Fucking Ninja and João Salgueiro (Who plays Tin Man)!
title: Bigodes Inglórios 2
